page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: Wrestlingworth is in the middle of important farming land in East Anglia. During our survey we looked at several farms. Home Farm owned by Mrs. Randall;Grange Farm owned by Mr. Bates; Common Farm owned by Mr. Simpkins; Water End Farm owned by Mr. Wilson; Church Farm owned by Mrs. Banks; Manor Farm owned by Mr. Woodcraft. All the farms around Wrestlingworth grow cereals, wheat and barley. Some grow peas, beans, potatoes, and sugar beet. Most grow oilseed rape. Only one farm had cattle and sheep.
